SMILES.description: A string representation of the chemical structure of big molecules using the SMILES (Simplified Molecular Input Line Entry System) notation.

pIC50.description: The negative logarithm of the half maximal inhibitory concentration (IC50) value, which is a measure of the effectiveness of a substance in inhibiting a specific biological or biochemical function. It is a standard measure in pharmacology.

mol.description: A string representation of the 3D structure of the big molecules.

num_atoms.description: The total number of atoms in the molecule.

logP.description: The logarithm of the partition coefficient (P) between octanol and water. It is a measure of the lipophilicity of the molecule, which can affect its distribution within the body.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in chemoinformatics.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the molecular structure, please predict the pIC50 value.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in chemoinformatics.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the molecular structure, please predict the logP value.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in chemoinformatics.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the molecular structure, please predict the number of atoms.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted number of atoms is ______.
